member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.multiplyVectorsIntoAMatrix(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Product of each element of array-1 (1D double) with each element of array-2 (1D double)
member.param: 1D double array - column vector (1 element per row)
1D double array - row vector (1 element column)
member.returns: 2D double array product matrix, value of element [i,j] = A[i] * B[j]

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.multiplyVectorsIntoAMatrix(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Product of each element of array-1 (1D int) with each element of array-2 (1D double)
member.param: 1D integer array - column vector (1 element per row)
1D double array - row vector (1 element column)
member.returns: 2D double array product matrix, value of element [i,j] = A[i] * B[j]

member.summary: Product of each element of array-1 (1D int) with each element of array-2 (1D int)
member.param: 1D integer array - column vector (1 element per row)
1D integer array - row vector (1 element column)
member.returns: 2D double array product matrix, value of element [i,j] = A[i] * B[j]

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.inverseUpper(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Inverses the matrix A only if the matrix has already been "triangularized" - meaning there are no elements in the bottom triangle - A[i,j]=0.0 where j>i
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: The inverted matrix, A^-1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.inverseUpper(System.Int32[0:,0:])
member.summary: Inverses the matrix A only if the matrix has already been "triangularized" - meaning there are no elements in the bottom triangle - A[i,j]=0.0 where j>i
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: The inverted matrix, A^-1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.inverse(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Inverses the matrix A only if the diagonal is all non-zero. A[i,i] != 0.0
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: The inverted matrix, A^-1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.inverse(System.Int32[0:,0:])
member.summary: Inverses the matrix A only if the diagonal is all non-zero. A[i,i] != 0.0
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: The inverted matrix, A^-1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.LUDecomposition(System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Returns the LU decomposition of A in a new matrix.
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: A matrix of equal size to A that combines the L and U. Here the diagonals belongs to L and the U's diagonal elements are all 1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.LUDecomposition(System.Int32[0:,0:])
member.summary: Returns the LU decomposition of A in a new matrix.
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
member.returns: A matrix of equal size to A that combines the L and U. Here the diagonals belongs to L and the U's diagonal elements are all 1.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.LUDecomposition(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Returns the LU decomposition of A in a new matrix.
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
The L matrix is output where the diagonal elements are included and not (necessarily) equal to one.
The U matrix is output where the diagonal elements are all equal to one.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.LUDecomposition(System.Int32[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:]@,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Returns the LU decomposition of A in a new matrix.
member.param: The matrix to invert. This matrix is unchanged by this function.
The L matrix is output where the diagonal elements are included and not (necessarily) equal to one.
The U matrix is output where the diagonal elements are all equal to one.

member.summary: Transposes the matrix, A.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.SetRow(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:],System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Sets/Replaces the given row of matrix A with the vector v.
member.param: The index of the row, rowIndex.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.SetColumn(System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:],System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Sets/Replaces the given column of matrix A with the vector v.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.GetColumns(System.Int32[],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Get more than one column from a given 2D double array. Invalid column indices numbers are ignored
member.param: 2D double array from which columns need to be extracted
member.returns: A single 2D double array that contains all the requested columns

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.GetColumns(System.Int32[],System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Generalization (overload) of the GetColumns function to be extended to a single row array. Invalid Column indices are ignored
member.param: 1D double array from which columns (elements) need to be extracted
member.returns: A single 1D double array that contains all the requested columns (elements)

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.GetColumns(System.Int32[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Generalization (overload) of the GetColumns function to be extended to a single row array for integers
member.param: 1D integer array from which columns (elements) need to be extracted
member.returns: A single 1D integer array that contains all the requested columns (elements)

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.GetRows(System.Int32[],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Get more than one row from a given 2D double array. Invalid row indices are ignored
member.param: 2D double array from which rows need to be extracted
member.returns: A single 2D double array that contains all the requested rows

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.JoinCol(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Jions two 2D double arrays side by side and returns the results. The given variables remain unchanged
member.param: The Matrix that comes on the left.
Matrix that is attached to the right
member.returns: A 2D double array that has Matrix1 and Matrix2 side by side

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.JoinRow(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Jions two 2D double arrays one under the other and returns the results. The given variables remain unchanged
member.param: The Matrix that comes on the top.
Matrix that is attached to the bottom
member.returns: A 2D double array that has Matrix1 and Matrix2 one below the other

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.JoinArr(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Concatenates two 1D double arrays and returns the result. The given variables remain unchanged
member.param: Array that comes to the left.
Array that is appended to the end of the first array
member.returns: A double array that has Array1 and Array2 side by side

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.JoinArr(System.Int32[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: Concatenates two 1D integer arrays and returns the result. The given variables remain unchanged
member.param: Array that comes to the left.
Array that is appended to the end of the first array
member.returns: An integer array that has Array1 and Array2 side by side

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.Translate(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a translated coordinate frame.
member.returns: 4-by-4 matrix translated by the amount specified.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.RotationX(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a rotation matrix about the X-axis.
member.param: The amount of angle in degrees (positive is counter-clockwise).
member.returns: 4-by-4 matrix rotated by the amount specified.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.RotationY(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a rotation matrix about the Y-axis.
member.param: The amount of angle in degrees (positive is counter-clockwise).
member.returns: 4-by-4 matrix rotated by the amount specified.

member.name: M:StarMathLib.StarMath.RotationZ(System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a rotation matrix about the Z-axis.
member.param: The amount of angle in degrees (positive is counter-clockwise).
member.returns: 4-by-4 matrix rotated by the amount specified.
